cn.salesuite.saf.app
Class SAFApp

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.app.Application
              cn.salesuite.saf.app.SAFApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2
public class SAFApp
extends android.app.Application

SAFApp是自定义的Application,session可作为缓存存放app的全局变量
SAFApp并不是每个app都需要使用,可自由选择,也可以继承它
如需使用SAFApp,则在AndroidManifest.xml中配置,
在application中增加android:name="cn.salesuite.saf.app.SAFApp"

Author:
Tony Shen
